description:
Haruhiro and his party are dealing with Manato`s death and figuring out what`s next. Will they get their party back together to survive?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: .البكاء لا يعني أنك ضعيف. التحمل لا يعني أنك قوي.
Crying Doesn`t Mean You`re Weak. Enduring Doesn`t Mean You`re Strong.
Naku no wa Yowai kara ja Nai. Taerareru no wa Tsuyoi kara ja Nai
Si je pleure, ce n`est pas par faiblesse. Si j`endure, ce n`est pas par force.
Zu weinen bedeutet nicht, dass man schwach ist
泣くのは弱いからじゃない. 耐えられるのは強いからじゃない
우는 건 약해서가 아니다, 견디는 건 강해서가 아니다
